message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd be willing to go up to $100. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. I can meet you at $100, but I'd rather get a bit more for it. How about $105?
I'm really close to my budget, so I'd be willing to go up to $102. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $102, but I think I can do a bit better. How about $107?
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm willing to go up to $104. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob! I can see you're willing to stretch your budget. I'm willing to meet you at $104, but I think I can get a bit more. How about $108?
